text.0:
#BlackInCardioWeek is 9 days away. We are going to engage on Twitter, have live panels/ interviews with Black experts in cardiovascular science and medicine and have fun (African dance class anyone?). 

#BlackInCardio https://t.co/hDvdE8nD7P
text.1: I'm happy to share my:1st_place_medal:author @TrendsMolecMed review, co-authored w/ Drs. @Greg_Szeto & Violeta Rus, discussing: :busts_in_silhouette:#lupus heterogeneity; :pill:pipeline of #drugs (incl. past failures & associated lessons); :dna:clinical trial design & #PersonalizedMedicine. https://t.co/HZIQweb4mR
